product_name: Continental Grand Prix II Foldable Tire
long_description: The Continental Grand Prix II Foldable Tire offers fast road performance, thanks to low rolling resistance, grippy rubber and good puncture protection. Specially formulated rubber compound delivers excellent all-around performance, supplying great traction, longevity and low rolling resistance. Puncture protection extends from shoulder-to-shoulder for protection under the entire tread. 110 tpi casing is supple for great road feel; folding bead helps keep weight low.
short_description: The Continental Grand Prix II Foldable Tire offers fast road performance, thanks to low rolling resistance, grippy rubber and good puncture protection.
